q1: Has the Argentina soccer team shown pride?
a1: Yes they are a proud team
q2: What do you think of their fan base?
a2: They expect to much and are easily disappointed.
q3: Yes, I consist of the same.
a3: One day Argentinian team will fulfill the expectations of the fans and everyone will be very happy in Argentina for while.
q5: Who's the best defender on the team?
a5: The best defender would be Otamendi
